Text:
It took 6 days to download this but that's not the worst part.  when i tried to watch it i found the file is corrupt!   The video freezes and is very choppy and too dark.   The audio is out of sync and just painful to try a watch.. i gave up after 10 minutes of torture.  I tried everything.  DIVX, WMP, and VLC.  nothing works.    

:(
was this fixed yet? does this work fine? info plzzz
